name: Sylveon

passive.name: Unstable Genes
passive.effect: You may treat Fairy Energy cards as Basic Energy cards with the type of any Pokemon with the "Unstable Genes" ability.

attacks.name: Disarming Cry
attacks.effect: The Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

flavor: A scientist tried to genetically alter her Eevee to be beautiful. Eevee reacted to this experiment in a very unexpected way.
